import React from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; const AuthorsCard = ({ authors }) => { const { id, name, avatar, email, username, website, bio } = authors; return (
Author:

{{ name }}
@{{ username }}
 {{ email }}
{{ website }}

"{{ bio }}"

Articles: {{ articlesCount }}
); }; export default AuthorsCard;
